biography: Kristian, a familiar face from Master Golf Club, has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on three occasions. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have remained elusive thus far, Kristian's dedication to the sport is undeniable.

Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Kristian meticulously studies every contour of the green and calculates each shot with unwavering precision. His fellow competitors often remark on his calm and collected demeanor, even when faced with the most challenging of circumstances. While he will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, one can hope that he will return to the course in future years to come.
